channel.title: Need help with my server
channel.description:
I just bought a vps(centos) for server hosting, but now i am stuck on turning the runserver.bat file into one that works for linux.I have tried to make it work but it keep on saying NoDefClassFound.
cd ../bin java Bulby/Server 43594
this is one that i am using. It is also saying that"No file or directory: ../bin. how can i make this work?

item.title: Need help with my server
item.dc:creator: @markjrk123 markjrk123
item.description:
@markjrk123 wrote:

it will still not working after i change it to

cd home/root/firescape/bin/Bulby
java Server 43594

it is still saying that is directory is wrong.

Here is the picture of where it the file is.

ImageShack

59033926.png - Click to see more photos

Store and share all of your images @ IMAGESHACK.com


That is where the file is. Server.class is under the file name called Bulby under bin.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with my server
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

since its linux, to change the dir, you need the full path. for example:

cd /home/USERNAME/SERVERFILES/

then to run it, you just need to run the JAVA command, in that same dir.

java server

Also, since it is a Linux os, the commands MUST match All the cases, and there can be NO spaces in the file names.

Read full topic
